text: Since her certification with ESD Global Self Defense in 2019, she has developed programs in Albania and Europe, reaching thousands of women and youth, recognized as a Gender Champion for her work. As of 2022, one of her achievements in ESD is the inclusion of this program in the National Strategy for Youth in Albania (2022-2029), and it is incorporated in the extra-curricular programmes of Albanian public schools, piloting it in 60 schools, where ESD Clubs have been established. She is currently leading the European Self Defense Network for Empowerment.
quote: 'Currently, my challenge is to bring our trauma-informed and empowering self defense programs to educational institutions for prevention and protecting institutions for trauma healing'- says Gentiana
